name: Echelon of the Fire Kings
effectText: Special Summon 3 FIRE monsters (1 Beast, 1 Beast-Warrior, 1 Winged Beast), 1 each from your hand, Deck, and GY, but their effects are negated, also destroy them during the End Phase. You can banish this card from your GY; this turn, your opponent cannot activate cards or effects when you Normal or Special Summon a "Fire King" monster(s). You can only use each effect of "Echelon of the Fire Kings" once per turn.
